name: 2024 5th International Conference on Computers and Artificial Intelligence Technology
content: Publication: Submitted Papers to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. For accepted papers, it will be published in the IEEE Conference Proceedings, included in IEEE Xplore, indexed by EI Compendex and SCOPUS.
organizers: Zhejiang A&F University, Macau University of Science and Technology, IEEE Macau, SIIT
